Episode.GuestStars: |Jeremiah Bitsui|Juan Carlos Cantu|Julie Pearl|Katerina Tannenbaum|KeiLyn Durrel Jones|Kerry Condon|Mark Margolis|Maximino Arciniega Jr.|Morgan Krantz|Peter Diseth|Poppy Liu|Ray Campbell|Sasha Feldman|
Episode.Overview: Jimmy's promotional stunt has unintended consequences. Nacho takes extreme measures to earn Lalo's trust. Saul is a success at the courthouse but still has yet to win Kim over. Simmering with rage and self-loathing, Mike loses his temper.
